author: skitching
msg: Manually force our custom java.util.logging.Handler class to be loaded via the
system classloader. This means that the unit test can successfully run even
when the class is not in the system classpath (as happens when running tests
with maven2's surefire plugin for example).

author: skitching
msg: When multiple jars on classpath match logical lib name, use jar with shortest name.

author: fuzzylogic
msg: DERBY-1241: When booting a database under security manager, boot may fail with
(java.io.FilePermission for logmirror.ctrl if database was not shutdown cleanly
after previous access. Fix uses existing privExists method to access the file,
